channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Edmund Fitzgerald 50th memorials: Where to join remembrances for the 29 lost on the ship
'I Know Nothing': Trump's Pardon Claim Slammed As His Biggest Hypocrisy Yet
Quicker Boeing deliveries help Ryanair boost profit, traffic forecast
Texas family rejects millions for their property and does something remarkable with it instead: 'I'm just very grateful'
Chinese buyers purchase Brazilian soybeans as prices ease over US-China trade thaw
Flight delays persist as government shutdown leads to air traffic controller shortages
item.description: Flight delays are continuing at U.S. airports amid air traffic controller shortages as the government shutdown enters its second month

item.title: Hearings to focus on National Guard deployments in the nation's capital and Memphis, Tennessee
item.description: Hearings are set in two states over the deployment of the National Guard as part of President Donald Trump's crime-fighting efforts

item.title: Tariffs are Trump's favorite foreign policy tool. The Supreme Court could change how he uses them
item.description: For President Donald Trump, tariffs — or the threat of them — can bend nations to his will

item.title: California law to protect Jewish students faces challenge over free speech concerns
item.description: The American-Arab Anti-Discrimination Committee is challenging a new California law designed to protect Jewish students from discrimination

item.title: Judge to weigh plea deal of funeral home owner accused of stashing decaying bodies
item.description: A Colorado funeral home owner has taken a plea deal after stashing nearly 190 decaying bodies in a bug-infested building
